row.process:
! &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# ! VARA.TECHNICAL.IVANTI ! :SET &MY_PACKAGE#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.IVANTI,PACKAGE_UNIX,1) :SET &MY_SSH_USER#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.IVANTI,SSH_USER,1) :SET &MY_SSH_PASWORD#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.IVANTI,SSH_PASSWORD,1)
echo scp &MY_PACKAGE# &MY_SSH_USER#@&GLOBAL_HOSTNAME#:/tmp ((RC=$RC+$?)) echo ssh &MY_SSH_USER#@&GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# "tar xf /tmp/&MY_PACKAGE#" ((RC=$RC+$?)) echo ssh &MY_SSH_USER#@&GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# /tmp/install_toi.sh ((RC=$RC+$?)) if [ $RC -ne 0 ] ; then echo ko :REGISTER_VARIABLE "MY_RC#",$RC fi

row.post_process: :IF &MY_RC# = "KO" : PRINT KO: install IVANTI pour &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# : PRINT DEBUG &EXIT_KISS_KO# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_KO#="&EXIT_KISS_KO#,install IVANTI pour &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME#" : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="IVANTI KO" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=10 :ELSE : PRINT OK: install IVANTI pour &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_OK#="&EXIT_KISS_OK#,install IVANTI pour &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME#" :ENDIF
